sub_fields.label: Boxes

sub_fields.label: box equal?
sub_fields.name: equal
sub_fields.instructions: check this box if you want to insert one, two or three boxes that have the same width on the page.

sub_fields.label: Paragraph CSS class

sub_fields.instructions: insert only css classes to assign to the paragraph
